message: I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to acquire something that will greatly benefit your business. I'm willing to sell it to you for $10,000.
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  I appreciate your enthusiasm! I'm really interested in the product, but $10,000 is a bit higher than I was hoping for.  Would you be willing to come down to $9,000?

I understand that $9,000 is a bit lower than my initial offer, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $9,500. This is the lowest I'm willing to go, but I think it's a fair price considering the product's value to you.
